name: NRS Radiant 3/2mm Wetsuit - Women's
description: A thin and comfortable wetsuit for summers north of the 49th. The Radiant's stretchy and heat-reflective neoprene locks in warmth in cool water, with a unique entry that eliminates the need to ask someone to zip you in. Thanks to a quick-drying lining, you won't have the shock of putting on a cold, damp wetsuit the following morning.3mm stretch neoprene provides, comfort and mobility.2mm PowerSpan neoprene in arms and lower legs for unrestricted movement.Titanium layer reflects heat back to your body so you stay warmer.ThermalPlush lining in arms and lower legs provides warmth and comfort next to skin.VaporLoft™ quick-drying lining in torso and thighs.Butterfly and hooded-style opening for ease of entry.Stitched and glued seams are smooth and comfortable against skin.ToughTex™ panels on wrists, ankles and knees add durability in high wear areas.
